info.order.label: 주문 세부 사항
info.modal.mobile.commerce.description.s: A message has been sent to the phone number provided. To confirm the payment, please follow the steps indicated in the SMS from the mobile operator. This tab can be closed.
Usually payment takes a few minutes, in rare cases, the process may take up to 3 days. Once payment is processed, you will receive a message from the mobile operator.

form.pay.upi.instruction: You can make payment via BHIM, PhonePe, Tez, ICICI, SBI and other UPI apps.
Example: xxxxx@ybl xxxxx@icicibank xxxx@paytm xxxx@ibl etc.
form.qr.code: 은행 앱으로 QR 코드를 스캔하여 결제를 완료하십시오

InvalidPaymentTool.text: 결제 실패: 잘못된 결제 데이터가 입력되었습니다.
steps: 이전 단계로 돌아가십시오.
유효한 카드 또는 계좌번호를 입력했는지 확인하십시오.
다시 “결제”를 누르십시오.
오류가 계속될 경우, 다른 카드나 계좌를 사용해 보십시오.

AccountLimitsExceeded.text: Payment failed: limits set by you exceeded.
steps: Please login to your online banking or back office account.
Please change limit settings and country restrictions.
Please return to checkout and press “Try again”.
If error persists please contact your bank or payment institution.
Please check your card or account balance.
If the funds are insufficient, please top up your account.
Please return to checkout and press “Try again”.
If error persists please try using a different card or bank account.

PreauthorizationFailed.text: Payment failed: can’t verify confirmation code.
steps: Please press “Try again”.
Please check if you are entering correct payment password or SMS authentication code.
Please check if you press a button 'To confirm' on the bank page or payment institution page.
If error persists please contact your bank or payment institution.

RejectedByIssuer.text: Payment failed: your payment institution has rejected the payment.
steps: Please check there are no limits or country rectrictions on the side of your online banking or bank back office.
Please check if your card or bank account is enabled for online payments.
Please contact your bank or payment institution.
Please try using a different card or bank account.

PaymentRejected.text: Payment failed: your payment has been rejected.
steps: Please try using a different card or bank account.
Please contact support of the website.

error.apple.pay.session.create: Failed to create Apple Pay session
error.samsung.pay.not.available: Samsung Pay payment is not available
